name: Park Hour
description:
A turn-based parkour game about the journey to your daily hour in the park. Where moving faster means actions take less time instead of making bigger moves.

Includes an online leaderboard to compare your "time" (not real time) to other players. !!! Game needs to be downloaded for this to work due to itch blocking the http request to the LootLocker API !!!

This game was made for the space score jam #19 with the theme parkour.

Assets Used (Credits):

  • City tiles by: Adam Saltsmanl
  • Grass tiles by: Adam Saltsman 
  • Pixel font by: Kenny
  • Music by: DOS88
